settings.text: Join St. Peter's for what will be an extraordinary trip to the storied waters of Argentina’s Northern Patagonia.  We will be fishing in the footsteps of Joe Brooks, Mel Krieger and Ted Williams, anglers that made trout fishing in Argentina famous.

settings.code:
The Fishery

Argentina’s Northern Patagonia, in the area surrounding Junin and San Martin de los Andes, is without question an anglers dream come true. Boundless trout fishing opportunities exist on its crystal clear rivers, secluded spring creeks and unspoiled mountain lakes. Andes Drifters, located in San Martin de los Andes, will be our local hosts. Their entire organization is committed to providing anglers with the trout fishing adventure of a lifetime. They are very professional and strive to deliver the highest standard of service.

settings.text:
Spring Creek Lodge is a dedicated fly fishing lodge located in Junin de los Andes. The lodge is situated adjacent to the Chimehuin River and also has easy access to many of the other local rivers. Including the Alumine,
Caleufu, Collon Cura and Malleo.  The lodge has six individual private chalets that contain two bedrooms,
shared bath and a living room. A great feature of lodging at SCL is that each angler has his or her own private bedroom. We have the entire lodge to ourselves. The lodge can accommodate 12 guests.  Meals are served in the clubhouse which includes a dining area, bar and
lounge. The dedicated staff provides great service and the chef prepares fresh gourmet meals nightly.

settings.code: ANDES DRIFTERS DELUXE RIVER CAMPS Andes Drifters has offered this unique option for a multitude of years. Their years of experience have literally equipped them to provide for all your needs. A dedicated camp staff is responsible for all camp chores. CAMP INCLUDES: *Dedicated camp staff and dedicated gear/equipment rafts *Tents, cots with mattresses, bedside table and flashlight *Sleeping bags with a comfort range down to 32 degrees F *Dining tent with tables and chairs *Chemical toilet with surrounding tent *Hot water shower with surrounding tent *Electronic power supply to illuminate camp & recharge batteries *All snacks, hors d’ oeuvres and meals *Mini bar, including scotch, vodka, whiskey, wine, beer & ice

settings.title: What's Included
settings.text:
• 5 nights at Spring Creek Lodge
  • 1 night in an Andes Drifters Deluxe River Camp*
  • 1 night in Bariloche at the Inacayal Hotel
  • All meals, soft drinks, beer, wine, and bar
  • 6 1/2 days of professionally guided fishing, including fishing license
  • All local transfers
  • 2 wine tasting experiences - discovering the wines of Argentina
  • 1 evening of local folk music
  • Voces de los Andes
  • 1 evening tango dance performance

*(If you do not wish to participate in the one night of camping you are welcome to stay at Spring Creek Lodge for two additional nights. However, this will increase your trip cost by an additional $200. Additionally, your return flight to Buenos Aires will be from San Martin de los Andes, not Bariloche.)

settings.title: What's Not Included
settings.text:
• International and domestic airfare
  • Expenses incurred prior to and after the fishing itinerary
  • Laundry
  • Gratuities
